name: StruWalker 3D Model
summary: Learn about .BSW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can view BSW files in Windows using StruWalker. There is no known macOS or Linux program that can view the BSW file.
StruWalker features 3D BIM modeling visualization and a variety of tools used in construction, fabrication, and engineering planning.

description: A BSW file is a 3D model created by StruWalker, a Building Information Modeling (BIM) program used by structural engineers to review 3D models. It contains a model of one or more steel structural parts for a building, which includes spatial elements and material information.
